channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Network Security Manager (NSM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Network Security Manager (NSM)

item.title: CVE-2021-4038|2024-08-03T17:16:03.446Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20network%20security%20manager%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in McAfee Network Security Manager (NSM) prior to 10.1 Minor 7 allows a remote authenticated administrator to embed a XSS in the administrator interface via specially crafted custom rules containing HTML. NSM did not correctly sanitize custom rule content in all scenarios.
